backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining authorization mixins, persistent stores for users, products, orders, events, and feature specs, plus admin-gated event logging and health checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state to the new schema, adding default product fields and ensuring persistence compatibility during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and documentation.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation outlining frontend-visible data model, authentication flow, and role-based access control behavior.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design spec describing the dark fantasy theme including colors, typography, spacing, and UI interaction patterns.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Describes local-only storage keys, canister-backed data caching, and offline support mechanisms including drafts and mutation queue.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 page features and outlines future enhancements for each site section.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Covers project scope, site map, navigation, access levels, and Phase 1 architecture goals.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides manual QA test cases for authentication, access control, and core shop features across browsers and devices.
Defines iteration workflow, offline-first mechanisms, feedback submission flow, and admin review process.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Explains deployment steps for backend and frontend, including IC canister setup and hosting options with required env vars.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React app and sets metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with routing, lazy-loaded pages, react-query client, theme provider, and global error handling.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team grid with flip cards showing member bios and expertise.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical milestone timeline with years, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and listing all orders with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminP: Form allowing admins to validate principals and reset admin passwords with mutation handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminR: UI section for listing admins and promoting or demoting principals with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Advanc: Admin controls for toggling shop availability, overriding product prices, and adjusting product visibility.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Analyt: Displays a snapshot of analytics data with loading states and a refresh mechanism.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Coupon: Provides a global switch to enable or disable coupon usage with status indicators and alerts.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Portfo: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/QuoteR: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Testim: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and session clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for collecting and saving a user's name and email during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that restricts access to admin content based on authentication and user role.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and displays a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Restricts access to owner-only areas by verifying identity and owner status, showing errors when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Renders a list of FAQ items using an accordion component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Empty placeholder file for a future guild orders dashboard panel.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Empty placeholder file for a future inventory dashboard panel.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Applies a fade‑in animation when content enters the viewport with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component toggling front/back views with keyboard and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Implements a parallax scrolling layer using requestAnimationFrame and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Empty placeholder file for a feedback dialog component.
Empty placeholder file for a feedback launcher component.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Displays a list of recent announcements in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: A carousel cycling through featured items with navigation controls and detail links.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Shows a grid of shortcut links to main site sections with icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the global app layout with header, footer, background, random quotes, and analytics.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with site links, legal info, branding, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with navigation links, auth buttons, and conditional admin links using mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Wrapper component that displays an optional title and description above page content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Empty placeholder file for a portfolio details modal component.
Empty placeholder file for a portfolio widget section component.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Fetches and displays 2–3 random quotes in styled cards on each navigation.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Accordion listing service offerings with icons, summaries, and detailed feature lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Modal showing full product details with images, pricing, stock, availability, and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Flip‑card product display showing image, price, stock, and a back side with summary and view‑details button.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Slide‑out cart drawer handling cart items, coupons, checkout, and order creation logic.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Hook providing text search, stock filtering, and sorting logic for shop product lists.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks page views on initial load and route changes using an analytics utility.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: A React error boundary that logs errors locally and displays a recovery UI with reload and troubleshooting options.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Displays an error alert with network/offline detection and an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineSy: Empty placeholder file for an offline sync queue dialog.
Empty placeholder file for offline sync status UI.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: A dialog that shows locally stored error logs with options to view details and clear the log.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Empty placeholder file for a testimony creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Renders a star-based rating component with filled and unfilled stars.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Empty placeholder file for a testimonies widget section.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a list of themed quotes used for random display across pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global handlers to log runtime errors and unhandled promise rejections to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity loading, and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Provides an IntersectionObserver-based hook that reports when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a versioned localStorage-backed shopping cart with add, remove, update, and quantity helper functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Manages form drafts in localStorage with load, save, expiry handling, and clearing for a given form ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Empty file placeholder for offline mutation replay logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference with cross-browser media query support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user, role, admin, and backend interactions using an actor-based API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Empty file placeholder for queued mutation functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns 2–3 random quotes that refresh on route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Tracks and stores recently viewed products in localStorage with capping and expiry.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Persists component state across a user session using a generated session ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines app-wide fonts, Tailwind layers, OKLCH color themes, dark mode variables, and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Implements first‑party and Google Analytics tracking with script injection and page/event logging.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Provides local error logging with sanitization, capped storage, and utilities to read, write, and clear logs.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Provides versioned, expiring, and safely handled localStorage utilities including get, set, remove, and cleanup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Implements a persistent offline mutation queue with enqueue, dequeue, retry tracking, failure marking, and clearing via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Selects 2–3 non-repeating random quotes from a predefined list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with creator background, mission content, and animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Displays an admin-only panel with placeholders for product, order, and user management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Renders the owner-only Admin+ panel with analytics, shop controls, coupon management, admin registry, and password tools.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Shows a grid of stylized lore-themed blog post previews with animations.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact form with input fields, simulated submission, and success toast within a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays user dashboard with profile setup, orders, and product data using various queries and conditional UI states.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Shows a searchable FAQ list with categories using an accordion layout.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, featured carousel, quick links, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Presents a static privacy policy divided into titled sections within a styled card.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays service details via an accordion and includes a call‑to‑action for custom service inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Main shop page that loads products, applies filters, handles loading/error/maintenance states, and manages product details and cart UI.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Static Terms of Service page displaying legal sections within a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Empty placeholder page component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, fonts, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current build phase, architecture notes, and implemented features for admin and shop controls.
